title: Maps: art and science
brief_description: Contrasts early maps with those of today, and then shows the technical procedures required in map making. The results of surveying, aerial photography, and barometric readings are gradually built up until they form a precise representation of the earths surface. Shows the various stages of the process in Sweden.
